interpretation:
The Rooster card represents a strong sense of self-assuredness and confidence. It symbolizes the ability to rise above challenges and maintain a state of vigilance. Like the rooster who crows at the break of dawn, this card encourages you to stay alert and aware of your surroundings. It’s a reminder to trust in your own abilities and be confident in your decisions.

The Rooster card also highlights the importance of timing and being in tune with natural rhythms. Just as the rooster’s crow signals the start of a new day, this card suggests that it’s time to embrace new beginnings and seize opportunities as they arise.

In a reading, the Rooster card may indicate that you need to be more assertive and take charge of a situation. It may also suggest that you need to be more aware of your surroundings and stay alert for potential obstacles.

Overall, the Rooster card encourages you to embrace your inner strength and stay vigilant in the pursuit of your goals.
